title: Bug 18705 - Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example is experiencing excessive flashing. It is unclear why this is happening.
OB: The entire screen is flashing rapidly in the Control Example.
EB: In the Control Example, only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted, resulting in minimal flashing.
SR:
1. Launch the Control Example.
2. Observe the flashing behavior.
3. Notice that the entire screen is flashing rapidly instead of only the bottom edge of the outermost frames.
